title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs, streaming, and embeddings support.

title: ollamajs (npm)
summary: Lightweight community npm wrapper around Ollama’s REST endpoints with TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Global CLI tool to chat, pull, and benchmark models without leaving the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Browser extension that adds Ollama-powered code suggestions inside GitHub, GitLab, and VS Code web.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma in a single Docker setup.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to your server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Private model registry with UI to upload, version, and gate custom GGUF models for Ollama.

title: ollama-benchmark
summary: Official benchmark scripts to measure tokens/sec across models and hardware configs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and embeddings; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on ergonomic chat sessions and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama for on-demand LLM answers with thread memory and reaction triggers.
